children.name: likeCostume
children.text: Hi there, I like your costume!
children.response: Thanks. Apparently Hana likes it too.

children.name: clockInquiry
children.text: Great. So, um, I'm looking for a clock? It belongs to the village. It was stolen. They want it back. So I'm helping them.
children.response: Sorry, I don't know anything about that.

children.name: hana
children.response: Yes. Apparently we're wearing the same outfit. And I can't talk her out of it.

children.name: justExploring
children.response: Sounds fun. If you haven't been down to the village yet, I would try that. That is, if you're looking for adventure.

entries.name: hanaCompleted
entries.text: Glad you got Hana her ComicCon tickets back. Is she still going as Leia?
